plot: A documentary about the background, influence and prejudices of Dutch soaps, hosted by Sophie Hilbrand, who interviews several current and former soap actors.
title: Soap: Wie is er niet groot mee geworden?
plot_es: A documentary about the background, influence and prejudices of Dutch soaps, hosted by Sophie Hilbrand, who interviews several current and former soap actors.
original_name: Soap: Wie is er niet groot mee geworden?
plot_en: A documentary about the background, influence and prejudices of Dutch soaps, hosted by Sophie Hilbrand, who interviews several current and former soap actors.
